briefdescription.para: Function to mount/unmount file system object to the FatFs module.

parameterdescription.para: Logical drive number to be mounted/unmounted n.
Pointer to new file system object (NULL for unmount)

briefdescription.para: Function to open or create a file.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the blank file object.
Access mode and file open mode flags.

briefdescription.para: Function to read data from a file.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to number of bytes read.

briefdescription.para: Function to move file pointer of a file object.

parameterdescription.para: File pointer from top of file .

briefdescription.para: Function to close an open file object.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the file object to be closed

briefdescription.para: Function to create a directory object.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to directory object to create.

briefdescription.para: Function to read directory entry in sequence.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the open directory object.
Pointer to file information to return.

briefdescription.para: Function to get the file status.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to file information to return .

briefdescription.para: Function to write data to the file.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the data to be written.
Pointer to number of bytes written.

briefdescription.para: Function to get number of free clusters on the drive.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the logical drive number (root dir).
Pointer to the variable to return number of free clusters.
Pointer to pointer to corresponding file system object to return.

briefdescription.para: Function to truncate a file.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the file object to be truncated.

briefdescription.para: Function to flush cached data of a writing file.
Function to delete an existing file or directory.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the file or directory path.

briefdescription.para: Function to create a new directory.
Function to change attribute of a file or directory.
Function to rename a file or directory.
Function to change current drive.
Function to change current directory.
Function to get current directory.
Function to divide a physical drive into multipe partitions.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the size table for each partitions.

briefdescription.para: Function to put a character to the file.
Function to print a formatted string into a file.
